title: Kick-starting the genome in early development

title_detail.value: Kick-starting the genome in early development

summary: We can think of the egg and sperm as information capsules with stored instructions for starting a new life, but post fertilization, what kick starts the interpretation of these instructions?

summary_detail.value: We can think of the egg and sperm as information capsules with stored instructions for starting a new life, but post fertilization, what kick starts the interpretation of these instructions?
